item.title: Theory: Pluto is the Master of Masters
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: There are too many oddities surrounding Pluto for them to be merely coincidence. There are too many scenes where Pluto is acting out of the norm for him to just be Mickey's loyal pet.

item.title: Warframe Prime Resurgence – How to Earn Aya
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: Prime Resurgence is an event in Warframe that will temporarily replace the existing Vaulted Relic system for Prime parts.

item.title: Golden Kappa is Not Random – It is Handed Out By Specific Users
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: The code snippet shown here implies that a list of specific users are able to assign the Golden Kappa to anyone they want. It may be that there is another part of the code that assigns it randomly, but even if that is true, these users can assign additional Golden Kappas at their own discretion.

item.title: Cooldown-Based Warframes – The Lavos Experiment
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: If Lavos's new cooldown-based system is going to continue for future Warframes, some changes need to be made.

item.title: The Loss of Customer Service to the Rise of Automation
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: If you have an issue with the current state of Customer Service, please press 1. The trend of automation at the expense of value needs to end. I had some terrible experiences with “Customer Service” phone lines today that made me reflect on how often this has been happening recently. It’s incredibly frustrating to call […]

item.title: Torghast is Not Fun and Not Rewarding
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: Now that we are a couple months into Shadowlands and the rush has settled down, issues with longevity start to become more obvious. While Torghast started as something fresh and exciting, I’m starting to struggle to find the motivation to even finish my weekly Soul Ash runs, let alone continue my slow grind through Twisting […]

item.title: Deimos Arcana Update – Bonewidow Necramech, Infested Kitguns, and Steel Path Changes
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: The Deimos Arcana update comes with a new Necramech, new weapons, changes to Steel Essence acquisition, and many other small changes.

item.title: How Good Are Dynamax Adventures
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: Are the new Dynamax Adventures in the Crown Tundra a good addition to Pokemon Sword and Shield? My thoughts on this new legendary experience.

item.title: How to Access the Crown Tundra
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: Learn how to get to the Crown Tundra and start your legendary adventure in Pokemon Sword and Shield's second expansion.

item.title: G-Max Coalossal Steam Engine Sweeper (Sw/Sh Doubles)
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: G-Max Coalossal can outspeed and OHKO almost anything with this Steam Engine Weakness Policy doubles team for Pokemon Sword & Shield.
